file_insights.primary_issue: Unsafe array access on external API response

file_insights.changes: Updated subtasks completed, session number, phase progression

patterns_discovered: Lack of defensive null checking on external API responses
Potential React hydration mismatches from unhandled errors
Inconsistent error handling across different modules
gotchas_discovered: Ad blockers can prevent external API requests
Network errors in production environments differ from local development
Unhandled promise rejections can cause cascading errors

approach_outcome.primary_fix: Add defensive null check using optional chaining and nullish coalescing

recommendations: Implement consistent null/undefined checking for all external data fetching
Add try-catch wrappers around API calls
Create unit tests to validate error handling scenarios
Consider implementing a global error boundary in React application
